name: Bean Bedlam
description:
Welcome to Bean Bedlam, the game where you control an army of bean characters to beat up hundreds of shadow guys! 

Controls

Left Mouse - Select Beans & Interact

Right Mouse - Command them beans

Middle Mouse - Pan and Zoom

Made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. This was also the first RTS I've ever made!

Enjoy the game!
